name: The Player and the Ball
description:
893/5000

There are some nights when we come home late, tired and exausted, after a long day of work or school. To relax, we want to play a little game, maybe a quick one, a simple one, easy to learn, and above all entertaining so much that it takes us out of reality  for while. The goal of this game is to fulfill this desire, we present it to you like this, like an arcade game from the good old days that will allow you to:
- Mainly play with a loved one in local multiplayer; however, there is a mode with an AI
-Try 3 types of matches (one with a very calming atmosphere)
-Try 3 unique types of challenges with a fair amount of difficulty
We sincerely hope that you will have a good time with our game and that it will meets  your expectations as a player.
Have fun!
